item.description:
Personal values

Empathy

High standards

Good isn’t good enough. All work has to be top notch

Meaningful long-term

Make short term sacrifices for long term success

Ownership is key

Don’t blame others, make excuses. Taking ownership is synonym of being resourceful and creative to find solutions

Data driven

God feeling is helpful for personal things but not for scientific solutions

Truth driven

Be honest and transparent to everybody (including yourself)

Nullam sagittis. Suspendisse pulvinar, augue ac venenatis condimentum, sem libero volutpat nibh, nec pellentesque velit pede quis nunc.
